page.title: 11Industry
page.content:
Industry
Because of being a rural area, industry is very sparse in the block. Bryngwyn Manor provides a centre for light engineering manufacturing precision parts.There are two garages providing automobile engineering, one at Much Birch and at Wormelow. Pool Spring Farm houses a store and office for Industrial lagging and insulation company. A craftsman making and repairing stained Glass windows is situated at the junction of the A49 and Tump Lane, and bookmaker and repairer works at Much Birch.
